statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT email, total_purchases, age FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, membership_level FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE membership_level = 'Gold';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE membership_level = 'Gold' ORDER BY total_purchases DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT customer_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, email, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, buying_behavior FROM customers WHERE buying_behavior = 'loyal';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE program_discount > 0;
SELECT program_name, program_discount FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_discount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE buying_behavior = 'loyal' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, buying_behavior FROM customers WHERE customer_id < 1000;
SELECT customer_name, program_name, program_discount FROM customers c JOIN loyalty_programs l ON c.customer_id = l.program_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_name, buying_behavior FROM customers ORDER BY buying_behavior, customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date = '2022-02-15';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, purchases.total_amount, promotions.discount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN promotions ON purchases.total_amount > 500 AND purchases.total_amount < 2000 ORDER BY promotions.discount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT promotion_name, discount, start_date, end_date FROM promotions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '58c16edf-6aee-4f65-ba31-2c478c1ac38f';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.unit_price, SUM(o.total_amount) AS total_sales FROM products p INNER JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id, p.product_name, p.unit_price;
SELECT c.full_name, o.order_date, p.product_name, p.unit_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT promotion_id, promotion_name, discount FROM promotions WHERE start_date < '2022-12-31' AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT segment_name, min_age, max_age FROM customer_segments ORDER BY min_age DESC;
SELECT program_name, discount_rate FROM loyalty_programs WHERE discount_rate > 0.1;
SELECT purchase_id, total_amount FROM purchases ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, buying_behavior FROM customers WHERE buying_behavior = 'impulsive' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchases.total_amount < 500 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT segment_name, min_age, max_age FROM customer_segments WHERE buying_behavior = 'loyal' AND min_age < 30 ORDER BY max_age DESC;
